title: China seeks stronger ties with France in strategic dialogue
description: Civil nuclear energy, artificial intelligence and new energy are among areas for more cooperation. Read more at straitstimes.com.
content:

title: Adtalem, Google Cloud to launch AI credential program for healthcare professionals
